student_allowance__combined_income.description: the personal income of that student; and the spousal or partner’s income of that student

student_allowance__has_a_spouse.description: Has spouse as per Student Allowances Regulations 1998

student_allowance__has_a_supported_child.description: has a supported child as per Student Allowances Regulations 1998

student_allowance__income_before_tax.description: income before tax includes gains before tax and profits before tax

student_allowance__is_a_student.description: student means a person who is enrolled or intends to enrol in a recognised course of study

student_allowance__is_childless.description: childless means not having a supported child or children

student_allowance__is_living_with_a_pare.description: living with a parent has the same meaning as in section 3(1) of the Social Security Act 1964

student_allowance__is_married_or_partner.description: married or partnered as per Student Allowances Regulations 1998

student_allowance__partner_has_a_support.description: their spouse has a supported child, as per Student Allowances Regulations 1998

student_allowance__partner_or_person_rec.description: Student not eligible for certain allowances where student or spouse or partner receiving social security payments, New Zealand superannuation, or veteran’s pension

student_allowance__eligible_for_basic_gr.description: eligibily for Student Allowance basic grant

student_allowance__eligible_for_independ.description: Eligible for Student Allowance Independent Circumstances Grant

student_allowance__approved_to_study_ove.description: is approved to study overseas under regulation 26

student_allowance__approved_to_study_par.description: is approved to study in a part-time course under regulation 12A.

student_allowance__eligible_for_certain_.description: Eligible to certain allowances under Student Allowance Regulations

student_allowance__is_enrolled_fulltime.description: is enrolled in a full-time course at a tertiary provider or secondary school

student_allowance__meets_attendance_and_.description: meets the attendance and performance requirements of that provider or school for tuition

early_childcare_hours_participation_per_.description: Number of hours per week person is participating in approved early-childhood education programmes

social_security_regulation__eligible_for.description: Eligibility of child for payment of childcare subsidy

social_security_regulation__family_has_c.description: Family has a child under 6 years old and eligible for Disability Allowance and in minimum childcare hours per week

social_security_regulation__family_has_r.description: Family has resident child aged 5 who will be enrolled in school and in minimum childcare hours per week
Family has a resident child who is under 5 years old, not in school and in minimum childcare hours per week

social_security_regulation__household_in.description: Household income is below Childcare Subsidy threshold

will_be_enrolled_in_school.description: Child will be enrolled in a school that has a cohort entry policy in place

number_of_years_lived_in_nz.description: Number of years lived in NZ

total_number_of_years_lived_in_nz_since_.description: Total number of years lived in NZ since age 20
Total number of years lived in NZ since age 50

has_a_partner.description: Is this person in a relationship?

has_been_married_or_in_a_civil_union_or_.description: He or she is not married but has been married or in a civil union or de facto relationship

is_adequately_supported_by_partner.description:
Is adequately supported by their partner? (false if lost the regular support of
    their partner as their partner has been imprisoned or is subject to release or detention conditions that prevent employment)

is_in_de_facto_relationship.description: Is in a de facto relationship?

is_married_or_in_a_civil_union_or_de_fac.description: He or she is married, or in a civil union or de facto relationship

is_of_full_capacity.description: is of full capacity (a person shall be deemed to be of full capacity if he is not of unsound mind)

age.description: The age of a Person (in years)

age_of_partner.description: The age of partner in a family

age_of_youngest.description: The age of the youngest member of a family

hours_per_week_employed.description: The hours per week a person is employed for

financially_supported_by_parent_or_guard.description: is being financially supported by a parent or guardian

has_dependent_child.description: has a dependent child or dependent children

living_with_parent_or_guardian.description: is living with a parent or guardian

immigration__holds_permanent_resident_vi.description: Holder of a permanent resident visa

immigration__is_protected_person.description: is recognised as a a protected person in New Zealand

is_nz_citizen.description:
New Zealand citizen means a person who has New Zealand citizenship as provided in
        the Citizenship Act 1977 or the Citizenship (Western Samoa) Act 1982

is_permanent_resident.description: Holder of a permanent resident visa

is_resident.description: Holder of a permanent resident visa or a resident visa

immigration__entitled_to_indefinite_stay.description: is entitled in terms of the Immigration Act 2009 to be in New Zealand indefinitely

acc__is_receiving_compensation.description: Is receiving compensation payment through ACC

parental_leave__a_person_other_than_biol.description: a person, other than the biological mother or her spouse or partner

parental_leave__applied_for_leave_or_sto.description: Has applied for/taken leave or stopped working immediately

parental_leave__had_previous_parental_le.description: Had previous parental leave in last six months

parental_leave__has_spouse_who_transferr.description: is the spouse of the biological mother, and she transferred her entitlement to this spouse

parental_leave__is_primary_carer.description: Is primary carer, as per Parental Leave and Employment Protection Act 1987

parental_leave__is_spouse_or_partner_of_.description: the spouse or partner of the biological mother

parental_leave__is_the_biological_mother.description: a female (the biological mother) who is pregnant or has given birth to a child

parental_leave__taking_permanent_primary.description: taking permanent primary responsibility for the care, development, and upbringing of a child who is under the age of 6 years (and if there is more than 1 such person, the person nominated in accordance with subsection (2)).

parental_leave__threshold_tests.description: satisfies Parental Leave Threshold Tests (tests are used to determine an employee's entitlements to parental leave)

parental_leave__transferred_her_entitlem.description: has transferred all or part of her entitlement to a parental leave payment to that spouse or partner

property_relationships__is_in_de_facto_r.description: in a de facto relationship, a relationship between 2 persons (whether a man and a woman, or a man and a man, or a woman and a woman)

rates_rebates__combined_income.description: Combined Income of applicant and others normally resident at property for the purposes of Rates Rebates

rates_rebates__dependants.description: Number of Persons classified as dependant for the purposes of Rates Rebates

rates_rebates__maximum_income_for_full_r.description: Maximum income eligible for the full rebate, less than this number should get full rebate

rates_rebates__minimum_income_for_no_reb.description: Minimum income that returns no rebate. Less than this number gets a rebate

rates_rebates__rebate.description: Yearly rebate applied to housing rates.

marriage__is_married.description: is married (marriage means the union of 2 people, regardless of their sex, sexual orientation, or gender identity)

super___eligibility_age.description: The age the applicant will be eligible for NZ Super.

super__eligibility.description: Classified as eligible for NZ Super

income_tax__residence.description: Boolean for if a Person is classified as meeting residence requirements

income_tax__taxable_income.description: A person's taxable income for a tax year

income_tax__dependent_child.description: Determines if a Person is classified as financially dependant

family_scheme__in_work_tax_credit_entitl.description: The in-work tax credit entitlement a person has under the family scheme

family_scheme__in_work_tax_credit_income.description: Is the income under the threshold for the in work tax credit

family_scheme__qualifies_for_in_work_tax.description: Is a person is qualified as eligible for the in-work tax credit

family_scheme__qualifies_for_minimum_fam.description: Is a person is qualified as eligible for the minimum family tax credit

family_scheme__parental_tax_credit_entit.description: The parental tax credit entitlement a person has under the family scheme

family_scheme__qualifies_for_parental_ta.description: Is a person is qualified as eligible for the parental tax credit

family_scheme__child_tax_credit_entitlem.description: The child tax credit entitlement a person has under the family scheme

family_scheme__qualifies_for_child_tax_c.description: Is a person qualified as eligible for the child tax credit

family_scheme__family_tax_credit_entitle.description: The family tax credit person is entitlement to under the family scheme

family_scheme__family_tax_credit_income_.description: Is the person income under the threshold for the family tax credit

family_scheme__qualifies_for_family_tax_.description: Is a person qualified as eligible for the family tax credit

family_scheme__assessable_income.description: The annual net income for a person as relates to the family scheme

family_scheme__assessable_income_for_mon.description: The monthly net income for a person as relates to the family scheme

family_scheme__base_qualifies.description: Is a person qualified as eligible under the family scheme

family_scheme__caregiver_age_qualifies.description: Is a person qualified under the family scheme age parameters

family_scheme__full_time_earner.description: Does the hours per week the person is employed for qualify them as a full time earner

family_scheme__has_dependent_children.description: A family has one or more people who qualify as financially dependant children

family_scheme__qualifies_as_principal_ca.description: Is the person the principal caregiver and do they have dependent children

family_scheme__qualifies_for_working_for.description: Is a person is qualified as eligible for the working for families

family_scheme__working_for_families_enti.description: The entitlement a person has under the family scheme

best_start__eligibility.description: Is each person classified as eligible for best start tax credit

best_start__entitlement.description: The total value the principal carer is entitled to for the best start tax credit

best_start__family_has_children_eligible.description: Is each family classified as eligible for best start tax credit

best_start__tax_credit_per_child.description: Value of a Families entitlement for best start tax credit

best_start__year_of_child.description: Returns the year of eligibilty either 1, 2 or 3 otherwise returns zero

citizenship__citizenship_by_grant_may_be.description: statisfies criteria such that the Minister may authorise the grant of New Zealand citizenship to this person

citizenship__has_sufficient_knowledge_of.description: has sufficient knowledge of the English language
has sufficient knowledge of the responsibilities and privileges attaching to New Zealand citizenship

citizenship__intends_crown_service.description: intends to enter into or continue in Crown service under the New Zealand Government

citizenship__intends_international_servi.description: intends to enter into or continue service under an international organisation of which the New Zealand Government is a member

citizenship__intends_nz_employment.description: intends to enter into or continue service in the employment of a person, company, society, or other body of persons resident or established in New Zealand

citizenship__intends_to_reside_in_nz.description: intends to continue to reside in New Zealand

citizenship__meets_5_year_presence_requi.description: was present in New Zealand for a minimum of 1,350 days during the 5 years immediately preceding the date of the application

citizenship__meets_each_year_minimum_pre.description: was present in New Zealand for at least 240 days in each the 5 years immediately preceding the date of application

citizenship__meets_minimum_presence_requ.description: meets the two presence in NZ requirements within the Citizenship Act

citizenship__meets_preceeding_single_yea.description: was present in New Zealand for at least 240 days in one rolling year immediately preceding the date of application

days_present_in_new_zealand_in_preceedin.description: was present in New Zealand this many days in the last (rolling) year

present_in_new_zealand.description: was present in New Zealand on this day

was_present_in_nz_and_entitled_to_indefi.description: was present in New Zealand and entitled to indefinite stay

civil_union__is_in_civil_union.description: Two people, whether they are of different or the same sex, may enter into a civil union under this Ac

veterans_support__is_being_paid_a_vetera.description: Is being paid a Veteran's Pension

veterans_support__is_entitled_to_be_paid.description: Applicant is a entitled to be paid veterans pension in a Pacific country

veterans_support__received_childrens_pen.description: Is classified as receiving a children's pension

veterans_support__received_parents_allow.description: Is classified as receiving a parent's allowance

social_security__disability_was_self_inf.description:
The person's restricted capacity for work, or total blindness, was self-inflicted and brought about by
    the person with a view to qualifying for a benefit

social_security__has_severely_restricted.description: Is incapable of regularly working 15 or more hours a week in open employment

accommodation_supplement__below_cash_thr.description: Cash is below Accommodation Supplement threshold?

accommodation_supplement__below_income_t.description: Income is below Accommodation Supplement threshold?

community_services_card__below_income_th.description: Income is below Community Services Card threshold?

jobseeker_support__below_income_threshol.description: Income is below Job Seeker Support threshold?

sole_parent_support__below_income_thresh.description: Income is below Sole Parent Support threshold?

sole_parent_support__family_has_child_un.description: Does the family have a child who meets the criteria for disabled

sole_parent_support__meets_age_threshold.description: Meets the age test for sole parent support?

sole_parent_support__meets_relationship_.description: Meets the sole parent support test for not being in a relationship

sole_parent_support__meets_years_in_nz_r.description: Has lived continuously in New Zealand for 2 years or more at any one time since becoming a New Zealand citizen or permanent resident?

supported_living_payment__below_income_t.description: Income below threshold for supported living payment

social_security__family_income_under_you.description: Person's family income is under the young parent payment threshold

social_security__meets_young_parent_paym.description: Meets Young Parent Payment single person requirements from section 165

social_security__has_orphaned_child_in_f.description: Family is caring for an orphan as per Social Security Act 1964

social_security__is_orphaned.description: each of the child's natural or adoptive parents is dead, or cannot be found, or suffers a serious long-term disablement which renders him or her unable to care for the child

social_security__spouse_is_a_specified_b.description:
his or her spouse is a specified beneficiary within the meaning of paragraphs (b) to (d) of the definition
        of that term in section 157.

social_security__is_being_paid_a_support.description: Is being paid a supported living payment

social_security__is_being_paid_a_young_p.description: Is being paid a a young parent payment

social_security__is_being_paid_a_youth_p.description: Is being paid a a youth payment

social_security__is_being_paid_an_emerge.description: Is being paid a a young parent payment

social_security__is_being_paid_sole_pare.description: Is being paid sole parent support

social_security__income_under_young_pare.description: Is their income under the Young Parent Payment threshold?

social_security__meets_young_parent_paym.description: Meets young parent payment basic requirements

jobseeker_support__meets_age_threshold.description: Meets the age test for Jobseeker Support?

has_community_services_card.description: Has a current Community Services Card

social_security__eligible_for_community_.description: is eligible for Community Services Card

social_security__is_in_full_employment.description: Is in full employment or full-time employment

social_security__is_a_child.description:
child means a single person under the age of 18 years, other than a person who is—
        (a) aged 16 years or 17 years; and
        (b) financially independent

social_security__in_receipt_of_basic_gra.description: in receipt of a basic grant or an independent circumstances grant under the Student Allowances Regulations 1998 (SR 1998/277)

social_security__is_financially_independ.description:
financially independent, in relation to a person, means—
        (a) in full employment; or
        (b) in receipt of a basic grant or an independent circumstances grant under the Student Allowances Regulations 1998 (SR 1998/277); or
        (c) in receipt of payments under a Government-assisted scheme which the chief executive considers analogous to a main benefit under this Act; or
        (d) in receipt of a main benefit under this Act

social_security__received_income_tested_.description: Boolean for if a Person is classified as receiving an income tested benefit

social_security__recieves_goverment_assi.description: In receipt of payments under a Government-assisted scheme which the chief executive considers analogous to a main benefit under Socal Security Act

social_security__recieves_main_benefit.description: in receipt of a main benefit under Social Security Act

social_security__meets_young_parent_paym.description: Meets Young Parent Payment single person requirements from section 165

social_security__has_resided_continuousl.description: has resided continuously in New Zealand for a period of at least 2 years at any one time

social_security__is_ordinarily_resident_.description: is ordinarily resident in New Zealand

social_security__single_young_person_in_.description: a young person in exceptional circumstances

disability_allowance__family_has_eligibl.description: Does the family have a child who meets the criteria for disabled

social_security__medical_certification_m.description: Number of future months the disability is expected to last for, in months

social_security__is_principal_carer_for_.description: Is the principal carer for one year (or more) from the application date

social_security__is_the_parent_of_depend.description: Is the parent of their dependent child

social_security__parents_unable_to_provi.description: because of a breakdown in the child’s family, no natural parent, adoptive parent, or step-parent of the child is able to care for the child or to provide fully for the child’s support

home_help__adopted_2_or_more_children.description: Have or adopted twins, and already has another child under 5.

home_help__had_multiple_birth.description: Had a multiple birth from the same pregnancy

home_help__has_no_immediate_family.description: Has no immediate family or anyone else living with you who can help
